select ,
from tb_image_case_info
where caseStatus=#{caseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DATE(caseDate) >= DATE(#{startDate})
AND DATE(caseDate)<= DATE(#{endDate})
AND DATE(caseDate)<= DATE(#{endDate})
AND userCode= #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
